member.name: T:Sqo.AsyncLock
member.summary: Defines a critical section with a mutual-exclusion lock.

member.name: M:Sqo.AsyncLock.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Sqo.Attributes.IgnoreAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to be used for a member of a storable class and that object will be ignored by siaqodb engine

member.name: T:Sqo.Attributes.MaxLengthAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to be used for a member of type String of a storable class to limit Length of a string object to be stored in database

member.name: M:Sqo.Attributes.MaxLengthAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create an attribute instance of Type MaxLength
member.param: number of characters from string to be stored in database

member.name: T:Sqo.Attributes.UseVariableAttribute
member.summary: Use this attribute if you use a Property and inside that property use some complex code and when Siaqodb engine is not able to get what is backing field of that Property, variableName is used for Siaqodb engine when that property is used

member.summary: Main interface to be used by implementers to retrieve objects from database

member.summary: Name of field stored in database

member.name: T:Sqo.Siaqodb
member.summary: Main class of siaqodb database engine responsible for storing, retrieving ,deleting objects on database files

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new instance of Siaqodb, database is not opened yet

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.Open(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder)
member.summary: Open database folder

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.StoreObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Insert or update object; if object is loaded from database and this method is called then update will occur, if object is new created then insert will occur

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.StoreObject(System.Object,Sqo.Transactions.Transaction)
member.summary: Insert or update object by a Transaction; if object is loaded from database and this method is called then update will occur, if object is new created then insert will occur

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.StoreObjectPartially(System.Object,System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Insert or update object partially, only provided properties are saved
member.param: object of which properties will be stored

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.LoadAll``1
member.summary: Load all objects of Type provided
member.typeparam: Type of objects to be loaded from database
member.returns: List of objects retrieved from database

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.LoadObjectByOID``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Load object from database by OID provided
member.typeparam: The Type of object to be loaded
member.returns: the object stored in database with oid provided

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.Close
member.summary: Close database

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.Flush
member.summary: Flush buffered data to database

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.Cast``1
member.summary: Cast method to be used in LINQ queries
member.typeparam: Type over which LINQ will take action

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.Query``1
member.summary: Query method to be used in LINQ queries
member.typeparam: Type over which LINQ will take action

member.summary: Load OIDs by expression
member.typeparam: Type for which OIDs will be loaded

member.summary: Load all object OIDs of MetaType provided

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.LoadValue(System.Int32,System.String,Sqo.MetaType)
member.summary: Load value of a field of an object identified by OID provided

member.summary: Delete an object from database

member.summary: Delete an object from database using a Transaction

member.param: Names of fields that this method will lookup for object to delete it

member.summary: Delete an object from database by a certain field(ex:ID that come from server)
member.param: Names of fields that this method will lookup for object to delete it

member.summary: Delete all objects of Type provided
member.typeparam: Type of objects to be deleted

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.DropType(System.Type)
member.summary: Delete all objects of Type provided
member.typeparam: Type of objects to be deleted

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.DropType(System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Delete all objects of Type provided
member.param: Type of objects to be deleted
If this is TRUE all dynamic length data associated with objects will be marked as free and Shrink method is able to free the space

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.GetAllTypes
member.summary: Return all Types from database folder

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.Count``1
member.summary: Return number of objects of Type provided

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.SetDatabaseFileName``1(System.String)
member.summary: this method is obsolete Use SiaqodbConfigurator.SetDatabaseFileName() method

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.UpdateObjectBy(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Update an object in database by a certain Field(eq: ID that come from a server)
member.param: FieldName by which update is made(eq an ID)
object that has all values but not OID to update it in database
member.returns: true if object was updated and false if object was not found in database

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.UpdateObjectBy(System.Object,System.String[])
member.summary: Update an object in database by certain Fields(eq: ID that come from a server)
member.param: name of fields by which update is made(eq an ID)
object that has all values but not OID to update it in database
member.returns: true if object was updated and false if object was not found in database

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.UpdateObjectBy(System.Object,Sqo.Transactions.Transaction,System.String[])
member.summary: Update an object in database by certain Fields(eq: ID that come from a server)
member.param: name of fields by which update is made(eq an ID)
object that has all values but not OID to update it in database
member.returns: true if object was updated and false if object was not found in database

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.GetDBPath
member.summary: return current database path

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Start a database Transaction to be used on insert/update/delete objects

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.LoadIndexValues``2(System.String)
member.summary: Get a list of unique values for a field index
member.param: Name of field or automatic property which is indexed

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.LoadAllLazy``1
member.summary: Load all objects in Lazy mode, objects are activated/read from db when it is accessed by index or by enumerator
member.typeparam: Type of objects to be loaded from database

member.name: M:Sqo.Siaqodb.GetOID(System.Object)
member.summary: Get OID of object, if the Type of object has not defined OID property then object and OID are weak cached during object load from database and this value is returned, otherwise it is returned value of the OID property
member.param: The object for which OID is returned
member.returns: The OID associated with object that is stored in database

member.name: E:Sqo.Siaqodb.SavingObject
member.summary: Raised before an object is saved in database

member.name: E:Sqo.Siaqodb.SavedObject
member.summary: Raised after an object is saved in database

member.name: E:Sqo.Siaqodb.DeletingObject
member.summary: Raised before an object is deleted from database

member.name: E:Sqo.Siaqodb.DeletedObject
member.summary: Raised after an object is deleted from database

member.name: E:Sqo.Siaqodb.LoadingObject
member.summary: Raised before an object is loaded from database

member.name: E:Sqo.Siaqodb.LoadedObject
member.summary: Raised after object is loaded from database

member.name: T:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator
member.summary: Class responsible for configurations of Siaqodb database engine

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.AddIndex(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Add an index for a field or automatic property of a certain Type,an Index can be added also by using Attribute: Sqo.Attributes.Index; both ways of adding index are similar
member.param: Field name or automatic property name

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.AddUniqueConstraint(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Add an UniqueConstraint for a field of a certain Type,an UniqueConstraint can be added also by using Attribute: Sqo.Attributes.UniqueConstraint; both ways of adding UniqueConstraint are similar
member.param: Field name or automatic property name

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.AddMaxLength(System.String,System.Int32,System.Type)
member.summary: Put MaxLength for a string field or automatic property of a Type, MaxLength can be set also by using Attribute: Sqo.Attributes.MaxLength
member.param: Field name or automatic property name

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.AddIgnore(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Ignore a field or automatic property to be stored
member.param: Name of field or automatic property

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.PropertyUseField(System.String,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Set the name of backing field for a property in case engine cannto discover it, this also can be set by attribute: Sqo.Attributes.UseVariable
member.param: Name of backing field of property

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.SetEncryptionPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Set the password for encryption algorithm used to encrypt database data

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.SetEncryptor(Sqo.Encryption.IEncryptor)
member.summary: Set your custom encryption algorithm that implemets IEncryptor interface
member.param: The instance of custom encryption algorithm

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.SetEncryptor(Sqo.BuildInAlgorithm)
member.summary: Set build-in encryption algorithm

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.SetDatabaseFileName``1(System.String)
member.summary: Set custom fileName on disk of database file for Type T
member.param: Name of database file on disk

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.LoadRelatedObjects``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: By default this is true for all types. Set this to false to not load childs entities of objects of Type provided
member.param: true if related object need to be loaded, false if you want to load by Include(...) method

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.SetRaiseLoadEvents(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set true to raise Loading/Loaded events

member.name: P:Sqo.SiaqodbConfigurator.EncryptedDatabase
member.summary: Set if database will be encrypted or not

member.name: T:Sqo.SiaqodbUtil
member.summary: Database utilities

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbUtil.ReIndex(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder)
member.summary: Rebuild and defragment indexes

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbUtil.Shrink(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder,Sqo.ShrinkType)
member.summary: Shrink database files including rawdata.sqr and indexes

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbUtil.Repair(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder)
member.summary: Repair database files by fixing corrupted objects bytes

member.name: M:Sqo.SiaqodbUtil.RepairType``1(Windows.Storage.StorageFolder)
member.summary: Repair database file of Type provided, the corrupted objects will be recuperated or deleted

member.name: F:Sqo.ShrinkType.Normal
member.summary: Normal shrink, all blocks marked as free will be supressed

member.name: F:Sqo.ShrinkType.ForceClaimSpace
member.summary: All database files will be parsed and check if a block can be marked as free then supress free blocks; This operation can be slow if your database is big.

member.name: F:Sqo.ShrinkType.Total
member.summary: This includes Normal + ForceClaimSpace but also shrink of every db file; after this operation OID values of the stored objects may change.

member.name: T:Sqo.SqoDataObject
P:Sqo.SqoDataObject.OID
member.summary: Object Identifier(unique per Type)

member.name: M:Sqo.Transactions.Transaction.Commit
member.summary: Commit transaction to database

member.name: M:Sqo.Transactions.Transaction.Rollback
member.summary: Rollback changes
